meanings.definition: A red dye used in biological staining.
meanings.sent1: The scientist used pararosaniline to color the cells for observation.
meanings.sent2: The pararosaniline dye gave a vibrant red hue to the fabric.
meanings.sent3: The students giggled as they accidentally spilled pararosaniline on their lab coats.
meanings.sent4: The sunset painted the sky with shades reminiscent of pararosaniline.
meanings.sent5: The vivid color of pararosaniline made the microscope slides stand out.

meanings.sent1: She carefully pararosaniline-stained the tissue samples for microscopic examination.
meanings.sent2: The artist decided to pararosaniline the canvas to achieve a deep red tone.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat managed to pararosaniline-stain its fur while playing in the lab.
meanings.sent4: His words seemed to pararosaniline-stain her heart with a lasting impression.
meanings.sent5: The raindrops seemed to pararosaniline-stain the window with a pattern of red streaks.
